page.title: 16EDUCATION : SCHOOLS
page.content: Four schools lie within the block. They are Wimboldsley County Primary, Cledford County Junior, Cledford County Infant and Middlewich County Infant. There are approximately 600 in these schools and they are aged from 5 to 11. Most older children go to Middlewich County Comprehensive School. Wimboldsley is an old village school, drawing children from its local as well as surrounding villages with a few coming from Middlewich town. The Cledford schools are modern (less than 15 years old) serving a developing area of Middlewich town. Middlewich Infant School is a 5 year old replacement for the former Middlewich C.E. Infant School. When aged 7 the children from this school transfer to Middlewich County Junior School which is on the same campus but not within the block.
